title: Albury: year round holiday centre
brief_description: A look at Albury, holiday and convention city, and its surrounding resorts. Shows the numerous amenities they can offer to the tourist or visitor. Points of interest seen are Lake Hume, Beechworth and its historic buildings and Mount Beauty and skiing at Falls Creek. No further credits available.
